title: Botanic Yellow
text: In the third quarter of the 20th century, technology had advanced to a point where it was possible to produce large, bold silkscreen prints. Here we see a wonderful play of leaves that simulates dense forests. The pattern was produced in several color ways and, of course, the choice of this panel references seasonal change.
description: Trees, foliage brown and orange with leaves outlined black; ground yellow green with leaves outlines black; trunks and branches are black
